definition: to speak/to talk/to converse/to chat/to discuss
abbr. for 論語|论语[Lun2 yu3], The Analects (of Confucius)
opinion/view/theory/doctrine/to discuss/to talk about/to regard/to consider/per/by the (kilometer, hour etc)

sentences.english: So much for corporate rhetoric about adding value to commoditized products.
sentences.chinese: 如此多的公司都高谈阔论着增加商品价值的花言巧语。

sentences.english: Don't be scared of high- flown language ofeconomists and Cabinet Ministers.
sentences.chinese: 不要被经济学家和内阁大臣们的高谈阔论所吓倒。

sentences.english: The politician's speech was full of high-sounding words.
sentences.chinese: 这位政客的演说满是高谈阔论。

sentences.english: Andswheresis this loudmouthed corporate executive taking his holiday?
sentences.chinese: 然而这位高谈阔论的公司总裁是在哪儿度假？

definition: to talk cheerfully and wittily/to joke together
to talk of the past and discuss the present (idiom)/to chat freely/to discuss everything
variant of 閒談|闲谈[xian2 tan2]
to talk endlessly/talking of anything under the sun
wine goblets and gambling chips lie intertwined/to drink and gamble together in a large group (idiom)/a big (drinking) party
mouth like a torrent (idiom)/eloquent/glib/voluble/have the gift of the gab
object of ridicule/laughingstock/to laugh over sth/to make light chat
to sit and pontificate; to find answers through theory and not through practice (idiom)
